Responsibilities: In an expanding production company, urgent recruitment will be done for skilled and hardworking sales representatives in the Household Care section.

ЁЯУЛ Product Categories:
1. Liquid Dishwash
2. Toilet Cleaner
3. Vixol/Tile Cleaner
4. Dam Finish/Pipe and Tank Cleaner

Main Responsibilities:
Market Expansion: Visiting various markets according to the designated route to collect product orders from hardware and hardware stores.

Presentation: Demonstrating product samples to retailers and explaining the quality and efficiency accurately.

Institutional Sales: Contacting various restaurants, cafes, hotels, and hospitals to complete deals.

Relationship Development: Maintaining good relationships with existing customers and collecting feedback or reports on products regularly.

However, skilled freshers are also encouraged to apply. тАЛNote: > * Freshers will have a probationary period of 3 months with a slightly lower basic salary. тАЛPreference will be given to smart and proactive candidates.
